comment: .People shouldn't be scared into thinking that they won't ever have a nd opportunity to prove they can be righteous. Yes, the first time they die is appointed for them so they can "SEE" what the end results of sin bring, i.e. nuclear war and total decimation of the population. but the nd death is the one that is eternal, not the first one.
